product_name: Black Diamond Alpine Ergo Cork Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The Black Diamond Alpine Ergo Cork trekking poles help keep you going at any altitude with goatlike sure-footedness and ease of use. 3-section poles provide patented FlickLock adjustability with ''zero-slip'' security. Simply flick the lock open, set the length and flick the lock closed-a quick, tight and easily accomplished task, even with gloved hands. For a solid grip, handles feature natural cork and dual-density rubber tops; cork molds to fit your hands over time and absorbs sweat. Grips feature a 15deg corrective angle that keeps your wrists in a neutral position for comfort and performance; it also helps prevent repetitive-motion injury and fatigue. Padded, adjustable wrist straps lend security and support. Sturdy carbide pole tips aid traction and can be exchanged with rubber tips (sold separately); trekking and powder baskets (included) let you use poles year around.
short_description: The Black Diamond Alpine Ergo Cork trekking poles help keep you going at any altitude with goatlike sure-footedness and ease of use.
